mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT NUM, TOTAL, COUNTING, REGIST_DATE, PRODUCT_NUM, USER_NUM, STATUS FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE NUM=#{num} ) A JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NUM=B.NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, PROFILE_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_UPLOAD_PATH,REGIST_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL,#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{profileFileName}, #{profileUploadPath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET EMAIL=#{email}, PASSWORD=#{password}, NICKNAME=#{nickname}, PHONE=#{phone},ADDRESS=#{address}, PROFILE_FILE_NAME=#{profileFileName}, PROFILE_UPLOAD_PATH=#{profileUploadPath}, REGIST_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE NUM=#{num}
